section.title: List SBBs bound to RA Entity Link
section.para: In the OPERATIONS tab, an operation to list all SBBs bound to a specific link is available. It is named List bound Sbbs.

note.para: Similar to most operations on &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM;, this operation can be scheduled for a later time and can have a defined timeout and/or include additional notes.

section.para: Clicking on the SCHEDULE executes (if Immediately is selected) or schedules the operation. After completion, it is shown in HISTORY, Completed Operations. Clicking on it shows the result(s).
